Package com.clover.sdk.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthTask
    Authenticates with the Clover service in the background.
    CloverAccount
    This class provides access to the Clover Account object on the device.
    CloverAuth
    Obtain authentication information.
    CloverAuth.AuthResult
    Container for the data returned when an account authenticates with the Clover service.
    CustomerMode
    This class allows an app to check and update the state of customer mode.
    Platform2
    This class provides basic information about the Clover device on which the app is currently running.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CustomerMode.State
    State of customer mode.
    Platform2.Feature
    List of features that may be present on Clover devices.
    Platform2.Orientation
